mapper.select: select MAX(bpmn_code) FROM t_bpmn_conf WHERE bpmn_code LIKE CONCAT(#{bpmnCodeParts}, '%')

SELECT a.id AS id, a.bpmn_code AS bpmnCode, a.form_code AS formCode, a.bpmn_name AS bpmnName, a.deduplication_type AS deduplicationType, a.effective_status AS effectiveStatus, a.business_party_id AS businessPartyId, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.remark AS remark FROM t_bpmn_conf a left join t_out_side_bpm_business_party b on a.business_party_id = b.id WHERE a.is_del = 0 and a.effective_status = 1 and a.is_out_side_process = 1 and b.business_party_mark=#{bpmnConfVo.businessPartyMark} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
